title: Eigenvector Architecture Simple
body_html:
Eigenvector Centrality Architecture

Problem

Current eigenvector centrality takes 2-5 minutes for 10k nodes.

Solution

Maintain eigenvector as a continuous index instead of batch computation.

Key Components

  1. GraphBLAS integration for fast matrix operations
  2. Power iteration with warm starts
  3. Multi-resolution caching
  4. Incremental updates

Performance Target

  • Current: 2-5 minutes
  • Target: Under 1 millisecond for cached queries

Implementation

27 issues created in Huly project GRAPH across 4 phases.

Status

Architecture proposal completed and documented.
